name: Satlink
description:
A vulnerability has been discovered in your satellites' firmware.
Hackers are spreading Ransomware.

Update your satellites before you run out of money.

yellow: money
green: vulnerable satellites
red: infected satellites
blue: updated satellites

controls:
WASD, RMB to scroll
scrollwheel to zoom
LMB to update satellite

Updating infected satellites costs you ransom.

Click fast!
